summary: Hindi-language welfare committee website for Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee, Maharajganj, Jaunpur.

existing_features.title: Update all instances of the organization name and location across the website to read 'Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee, Maharajganj, Jaunpur'. This includes the page title in index.html, the Header component (logo/name display), HeroSection tagline/title, AboutSection, ContactSection address, DonateSection, and any other component that references the organization name or location.
